172.59: And from the beginning (before the destruction) what would they say?
172.58: “The Lord is the builder of Jerusalem…” (Psalms 147:2)
172.55: This is what Raba bar Rav Shilah said:
172.54: It is written “On your walls, O Jerusalem, I have appointed watchmen; all day and all night, they shall never be silent; those who remind the Lord, be not silent.” (Isaiah 62:6) What do they say?
172.56: “You will rise, You will have mercy on Zion…” (Psalms 102:14)
172.61: “For the Lord has chosen Zion; He desired it for His habitation.” (Psalms 132:13)
